on_boarding_page_1_subtitle: Ordering food has never been easier. Browse menus, select dishes, and pay with just a few taps.
on_boarding_page_2_subtitle: Explore the best restaurants in your area and discover new ones. You can filter by cuisine type, rating, and more.
on_boarding_page_3_subtitle: Your food will be delivered straight to your door. No need to brave the elements or leave your house.
welcome_page_subtitle: Browse through our menu and discover new dishes from different cultures. Customize your orders and select your preferred payment method.
welcome_page_subtitle_2: Sign up now to start ordering.
